entry.title: Preparing my TextMate
entry.content:
Once the TextMate is installed. First, I install the GetBundles bundle using the commands below from my Terminal.

bash mkdir -p ~/Library/Application\ Support/TextMate/Bundles cd !$ svn co http://svn.textmate.org/trunk/Review/Bundles/GetBundles.tmbundle/ osascript -e 'tell app "TextMate" to reload bundles'

Then I goto Bundles > GetBundles > Get Bundles and update my outdated bundles by pressing âŒ˜+U (Install all Updates). After that, I install the following bundles -

LESS - a textmate bundle for less css using the node version of the library at http://github.com/cloudhead/less.js (by Tim Caswell)
